main.java

Class SentenceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.SentenceBuilder

  • public class SentenceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes lines provided by FileHandler and populates lists with Sentence-objects.
    Author:
    Piraveen

      • getSentences

        private java.util.ArrayList<Sentence> getSentences(java.lang.String path)
        This method reads every line in the file and splits it into sentences. The method is currently statically set to split for either every dot or every dot and a space using regular expression.
        Parameters:
        language - language code in capital letters
        path - either relative or absolute filepath
